prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a sleek, armored body and bright golden accents.
Show me a fierce fighting-type Pokemon that has a muscular build and striking yellow and gray colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends elements of both dragon and fighting types, showcasing a unique visual style.
Make a character design for a Pokemon that is both powerful and agile, with a distinct bipedal stance.
Generate a Pokemon featuring a mix of silver and gold tones, with a striking stance and elaborate details.
Design a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with an emphasis on its dragon-like features.
Give me an illustration of a Pokemon that thrives in mountain habitats, showcasing its combat prowess.
